testsuite.name: Verify that the results match the search criteria

testcase.classname: Verify that the results match the search criteria
testcase.name: Open www.airbnb.com.

testcase.classname: Verify that the results match the search criteria
testcase.name: Enter the search criteria

testcase.classname: Verify that the results match the search criteria
testcase.name: Verify that the applied filters are correct.

testcase.classname: Verify that the results match the search criteria
testcase.name: Verify that the properties displayed on the first page can accommodate at least the selected number of guests.

testsuite.name: Verify that the results and details page match the extra filters

testcase.classname: Verify that the results and details page match the extra filters
testcase.name: Open www.airbnb.com.

testcase.classname: Verify that the results and details page match the extra filters
testcase.name: Enter the search criteria

testcase.classname: Verify that the results and details page match the extra filters
testcase.name: Apply more filters

testcase.classname: Verify that the results and details page match the extra filters
testcase.name: Verify that the properties displayed on the first page have at least the number of selected bedroom.

testcase.classname: Verify that the results and details page match the extra filters
testcase.name: Open the details of the first property and Check that in the Amenities popup Pool is displayed under Facilities category.

testsuite.name: Verify that a property is displayed on the map correctly

testcase.classname: Verify that a property is displayed on the map correctly
testcase.name: Open www.airbnb.com.

testcase.classname: Verify that a property is displayed on the map correctly
testcase.name: Enter the search criteria

testcase.classname: Verify that a property is displayed on the map correctly
testcase.name: Hover over the first property and Check that the property is displayed on the map and the color changes to indicate the selection.

testcase.classname: Verify that a property is displayed on the map correctly
testcase.name: After identifying the property on the map, click it and Verify that the details shown in the map popup are the same as the ones shown in the search results.
